alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Central Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:09AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Calhoun, west central Clarendon, southeastern Bamberg and central Orangeburg Counties through 545 AM EDT... At 509 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Orangeburg County Airport to Branchville to Padgetts. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Branchville, Bowman, Elloree, Santee State Park, Santee, Rowesville, Poplar Creek Landing, Stumphole Landing, Yonder Field and Low Falls Landing. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 151 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
